name: Dogs++
description:
Dogs++ is a puzzle platformer about creating an unstable tower of dogs on your head. Made for Ludum Dare 49, with the theme "Unstable".

Controls

🐕Left & Right Arrow Keys / A & D - Move

🐕 Space / Z - Jump

🐕 Up & Down Arrow Keys / W & S - Switch which dog you are controlling

🐕 R - Reset level

🐕 M - Mute music

If you get stuck, I put together a playthrough that shows you how to beat each level!

List of bug fixes / porting changes:

  • Skip frames so the game doesn’t slow down on slower machines
  • Remove random variance in dog speed that I forgot to remove

Let me know what you think of it! I’ll be working on a post compo version with a few tweaks and extra levels, so stay tuned :)

And if you entered Ludum Dare, please leave a rating! Here is the link to the game's Ludum Dare entry page!
